    • do_part1

      public static String do_part1(String fileName)
      PART 1: Partition Movies to Create Input Files for Part 2. Implementing a method called "do_part1". Reading the all the movie records from all the files. Validate each movie record using exceptions. Partition valid movie records to new genre-based text files. Partition bad movie records to a bad movie text file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of file that will be validated to
      Returns:
      a string called "part2_manifest"
